precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The context menu titled 'Arrange Icons By' is open on the desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will display the "Screen Saver" settings. The screen saver preview will update to show the currently selected screen saver.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen saver" drop-down list.
expected_results: A list of available screen savers will appear. The preview window will display a black screen with the text "(None)" and the "Settings" button will become enabled.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is expanded.
action: Click the "3D FlowerBox" item in the "Screen saver" dropdown list.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will close. The screen saver preview will update to show a rotating cube with flowers. A pop-up window titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the dropdown arrow of the "Power schemes" list box.
expected_results: The "Power schemes" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of available power schemes.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power schemes" dropdown menu visible.
action: Click the "Always On" option in the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Always On" power scheme will be selected, and the "Turn off monitor" setting will change to "After 30 mins".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Always On" power scheme selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to the "Turn off monitor" option under the "Settings for Always On power scheme" section.
expected_results: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Always On" power scheme is selected.
action: Click the "Never" option in the dropdown menu next to "System hibernates".
expected_results: A pop-up notification titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Apply" button is active.
expected_results: The "Apply" button will become inactive and a pop-up titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Always On" power scheme selected and all power management options set to "Never".
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.
